fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You can shoot someone during the day, dealing them a basic attack. If they’re adjacent to you, you instead deal a powerful attack. You only have one bullet. If you are attacked at night, you’ll deal a basic attack to your attacker (you don’t need a bullet to do this). (If there are multiple attackers RNG which one is attacked).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Gunslinger and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
(Day Shot Message) The Gunslinger shot \_\_\_\_\_\_! (Still appears even if the target was not killed).
\_\_\_\_\_\_ was found dead last night. They were shot by the Gunslinger.
The Gunslinger used their final breath to shoot you!
You used your final breath to shoot \_\_\_\_\_\_!
